name: duke-of-url
title: Duke of URL
description: Make it easy to work with a URL
author: awoods

commands.name: edit
commands.title: Edit Query Parameters
commands.description: Change the parameters in the Page URL

commands.name: extract
commands.title: Extract URL Version
commands.description: Copy a version of your long URL

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
